app.name: Survey
app.description: An app which asks the user to fill out some questions.

messageIds.introText:
# Appsemble survey
This app is a template app used to demo how a survey app could be created using [Appsemble](https://appsemble.app).
messageIds.triedAppsemble: Have you tried building an app in Appsemble yet?
messageIds.appsembleRating: How do you rate your experience with Appsemble?
messageIds.betterExperience: Please tell us how we can make your experience better
messageIds.notTriedReason: Please tell us your reasons you didn't try yet?
messageIds.features: How important would you rate the following features:
messageIds.graphicalEditor: Graphical app editor (allowing no-code rather than low-code)
messageIds.commonGround: Become (even) more compatible with common ground
messageIds.consideringAppsemble: Are you considering Appsemble for your next app in the next 6 months?
messageIds.buildYourself: Do you intend to build an app yourself or let someone else build it?
messageIds.featureImportanceBuildingBlocks: How important is having many building blocks to choose from?
messageIds.featureImportanceConstructing: How important is the ease of use constructing the app
messageIds.featureImportanceCommunitySupport: How important is having community support?
messageIds.propertyImportanceBuildCosts: How important is having low one time building costs?
messageIds.propertyImportanceMaintenanceCosts: How important is having low maintenance costs once built?
messageIds.propertyImportanceHostCosts: How important is having low monthly hosting costs?
messageIds.propertyImportancePaidSupport: How important is having paid support?
messageIds.whyNot: We’d like to learn why you’re not considering Appsemble
messageIds.whyNotPlaceholder: e.g. No need for an app, or rather not with Appsemble
messageIds.anythingElse: Is there anything else you’d like to tell us?
messageIds.finished: Thank you for taking our survey. You can try [Appsemble](https://appsemble.app) yourself to create your own app. This app can be cloned from [our store page](https://appsemble.app/apps/{appId}).
